word: The grace of God sustained him. During the weeks of suffering that passed before his final sentence, Heaven's peace filled his soul. \93I write this letter,\94 he said to a friend, \93in prison, and with my fettered hand, expecting my sentence of death tomorrow. . . . When, with the assistance of Jesus Christ, we shall meet again in the delicious peace of the future life, you will learn how merciful God has shown himself toward me\97how effectually he has supported me in the midst of my temptations and trials.\94
